editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

editorialNotes.standard: The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone needs a task manager – and this Apple Design Award winner is adaptable enough for anyone. Organising items is as simple as dragging them where you want them, and the Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-dos from anywhere in the app.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: After a long day at work, it’s bath time! But Swampy’s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

editorialNotes.standard: The concept behind Kingdom Rush Frontiers is exceptionally simple: take the same great ideas, visual style, and fiendishly difficult tower defense that millions fell in love with in the original game and improve it by adding tons of incredible content. Frontiers packs new heroes, settings, towers, and tons of fresh enemies to fend off, making the frenzied action even harder to put down.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: If they see you coming, it’s too late! Your mind is still your best weapon in the updated version of this sneaky 2006 action game.

You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, you’ll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage you’ll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.

editorialNotes.tagline: Put an end to the terror

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Deliver packages to rebuild a ravaged society – and unravel supernatural mysteries – in this wild post-apocalyptic adventure crafted by legendary game maker Hideo Kojima.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Is it a silhouette of two faces, or is it a picture of a vase? In the spirit of that classic optical illusion, Voi is an elegant shape-matching puzzler that makes you think about what isn’t there as much as what is. An accessible, zen-like experience with no time limits and no pressure, it’s simultaneously challenging and calming.

editorialNotes.short: When pigeons race at high-speeds in tiny planes, everybody wins.

editorialNotes.standard: It’s one thing to say you’d never take a bribe: It’s quite another when your options are taking one or missing rent or going hungry. That’s but a taste of the moral quandaries in Papers, Please, which puts you in the shoes of a border checkpoint agent in a fictional 1980s nation. Learning to master passport processing skills, avoiding fines, and making the most of your paycheck is uniquely satisfying and provocative in a way few games manage to achieve. This celebrated indie gem teaches us as much about empathy as it does time management.

A fascinating reinvention of a longtime videogame franchise, Hitman GO takes familiar elements of stealth and assassination and reinterprets them as a wondrously stylised, turn-based boardgame. Each mission presents characters and scenes—some from previous Hitman games—as a sleek diorama, blending old and new to create an innovative experience. Even with helpful distractions and places to hide, inching toward your targets a step at a time demands keen strategy, and trying to pull off optional mission objectives quickly becomes an irresistible obsession.
Randomly generated levels keep every punishing platforming challenge fresh as you dash to save your kid.

editorialNotes.tagline: Hide and seek in the Wild West

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: When dinosaurs collide with LEGO bricks, you don’t have to be Mr. DNA to know the result is pure fun. Starring characters and creatures from all four Jurassic Park movies, this fantastic adventure lets you relive your favorite moments from the series and even create new ones with your own custom dinos. Full of all the humor, action, and surprises you expect, it’s a wacky team-up of T-Rex proportions.
This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.
